name: Chasing Blue: A Pirate World
description:
Get ready to set sail on an epic adventure across the seven seas in "Chasing Blue: A Pirate's World"! As a daring pirate, you'll embark on a thrilling journey to hunt down opposing pirate ships and claim the ultimate prize - becoming the most feared pirate on the high seas.

But be warned, danger lurks around every corner as you encounter treacherous storms that may never even come to bear, sea creatures that don't exist, and rival imaginary pirate crews determined to sink your ship and steal your treasure. With your trusty crew (yourself) by your side and your sharp wits, you must navigate through charted waters and attempt to outsmart your foes to emerge.

With stunning graphics, immersive gameplay, and no soundtrack, "Chasing Blue: A Pirate's World" will transport you to a world of adventure, danger, and excitement. Whether you're a seasoned pirate or a newcomer to the high seas, this game will test your skills and leave you craving more.

So hoist the Jolly Roger (not yet implemented), set your sights on the horizon, and join the hunt for treasure in "Chasing Blue: A Pirate's World" - the ultimate pirate adventure game!

Controls: WASD & Mouse

Please do not pirate our game :)

Citations:

James Duran (Coder)

Maxfield (To whom it's dedicated)

Ahoy, my heart beats fast at the thought of thee, My Maxfield, how you steal my heart at sea. With hair as dark as the stormy night, And eyes that sparkle with the moon's pure light.

A pirate's life is rough, but with you by my side, I feel like I could conquer the ocean wide. Your voice, it rings like the sound of waves, A siren's call, I am powerless to resist, aye.

Your courage and your skill with sword in hand, Leave me in awe, a true pirate of the land. And yet, 'tis not just your strength and power, But your kindness and your heart that I desire.

With you, I find a sense of peace, A home in the tumultuous seas. Maxfield, my heart is yours, Forever and always, from these pirate shores.

So come aboard, my love, and set sail with me, Together we'll roam the vast, endless sea. And when the wind takes us far and wide, Our love will be the anchor that keeps us tied.

So Needy.
